name: Egg Trainer
description:
Egg Trainer

In this monster battling  game, you buy eggs of various elemental types and rarities, and hatch them into creatures. These creature all have names, stats, and illustrations, which makes each one unique! Can you find them all?

Once you've hatched a set of six creatures, you can train them and challenge a friend to a two-on-two battle to prove who has the stronger team!

The news feed is regularly updated with the latest development notes.

This game requires an email to sign up and log in.

The download link below will take you to the game (itch is a bit weird).
